programme.title: Mixed Team QFs/SFs/Finals | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals and Finals for Mixed Team Archery took place on 02/08/2024 at Invalides. Korea won Gold, Germany won Silver, and United States won Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Omnium, Women's Sprint, Men's Keirin | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Omnium, the Women's Sprint and the Men's Keirin which took place at the Saint-Quentin-En-Yvelines Velodrome on 11/08/24.
The Men's Keirin was won by Harrie Lavreysen (NED) with Gold, Matthew Richardson (AUS) with Silver and Matthew Glaetzer (AUS) with Bronze.
The Women's Sprint was won by Ellesse Andrews (NZL) with Gold, Lea Friedrich (GER) with Silver and Emma Finucane (GBR) with Bronze.
The Women's Omnium was won by Jennifer Valente (USA) with Gold, Daria Pikulik (POL) with Silver and Ally Wollaston (NZL) with Bronze.

programme.title: Anatomy of: Skateboard, Badminton and Athletics
programme.desc: In a sports science lab, we studied the physiques of skateboarder Tom Schaar, badminton player Marcus Ellis, and hurdler and bobsledder Lolo Jones to find our what makes them special at their sports.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Basketball Player: The Incredible Stamina of Laetitia Guapo
programme.desc: We took French 3x3 basketball player Laetitia Guapo and examined her unique physical characteristics in a sports science lab to find out the what it takes to be FIBA's world number 1 ranked female basketball player. With the help of Olympian Lolo Jones, each episode of our sports science original series Anatomy of studies the powers and physiques of an elite athlete to find out what makes them special in their sport.

programme.title: The enduring family legacy of Olympic canoe legend Matija Ljubek
programme.desc: The sprint canoeist Matija Ljubek won four medals at four Olympic Games for Yugoslavia and became a national hero in the process. He passed on his love for the sport to his son Nikica, who became an Olympian himself.

programme.title: From NYC to Alaska, meet the pioneers and US champion | Breaking Life
programme.desc: As the birthplace of a global hip-hop movement, we meet some of the pioneers of Breaking in New-York City. While Kid Glyde shares his passion for breaking with the next generation at his Harlem studio, three thousand miles away in Anchorage Alaska, B-Boy Icey Ives, two-time US national champion, melts the ice with his local crew Frozen Flow while being a community leader, a teacher and a role model for the youth living in extremely challenging conditions.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals | Cycling BMX Racing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Cycling BMX Racing Semi-Finals & Finals took place on 02/08/2024 at Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines BMX Stadium.
The Men's Final was won by Joris Daudet (FRA) with Gold, Sylvain Andre (FRA) with Silver and Romain Mahieu (FRA) with Bronze.
The Women's Final was won by Saya Sakakibara (AUS) with Gold, Manon Veenstra (NED) with Silver and Zoe Claessens (SUI) with Bronze.

programme.title: Men's Final | Cycling BMX Racing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Cycling BMX Racing Men's Finals took place on 02/08/2024 at Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines BMX Stadium.
Joris Daudet (FRA) won Gold, Sylvain Andre (FRA) won Silver and Romain Mahieu (FRA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Bakhodir Jalolov (UZB) v Ayoub Ghadfa Drissi El Aissaoui (ESP) - Men's +92kg Final | Boxing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Bakhodir Jalolov (UZB) claimed Gold and Ayoub Ghadfa Drissi El Aissaoui (ESP) get the Silver in the final that took place on 10/08/24 at Roland-Garros Stadium, Paris.

programme.title: Lin Yu Ting (TPE) v Julia Szeremeta (POL) - Women's 57kg Final | Boxing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Lin Yu Ting (TPE) claimed Gold and and Julia Szeremeta (POL) get the Silver in the final that took place on 10/08/24 at Roland-Garros Stadium, Paris.

programme.title: Abdumalik Khalokov (UZB) v Munarbek Seiitbek Uulu (KGZ) - Men's 57kg Final | Boxing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Abdumalik Khalokov (UZB) claimed Gold and Munarbek Seiitbek Uulu (KGZ) get the Silver in the final that took place on 10/08/24 at Roland-Garros Stadium, Paris.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 14 | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Women's Canoe and Kayak Doubles 500m Semi-Finals and Finals, the Men's Kayak Double 500m Semi-Finals and Finals and the Men's Canoe Single 1000m Semi-Finals and Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 09/08/24.
The Women's Canoe Double 500m Final was won by Xu /Sun (CHN) with Gold, Luzan/Rybachok (UKR) took silver and Mackenzie/Vincent (CAN) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Carrington/Hoskin (NZL) with Gold, Csipes/Gazso (HUN) with Silver and a tie in Bronze for Paulina Paszek/Julie Marie Hake (GER) and Pupp/Fojt (HUN).
The Men's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Schopf/Lemke (GER) with Gold, Bence Nadas/Totka (HUN) with Silver and Van Der Westhuyzen/Green (AUS) with Bronze.
The Men's Canoe Single 1000m Final was won by Martin Fuksa (CZE) with Gold, Isaquias Queiroz (BRA) with Silver and Serghei Tarnovschi (MDA) with Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Sprint, Men's Keirin, Men's Madison | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session contains the Women's Sprint 1/8 Finals, the Men's Keirin First Round, and the Men's Madison Final which took place at the Saint-Quentin-En-Yvelines Velodrome on 10/08/24.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Men's & Women's Sprint, Women's Madison | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Men's Sprint Bronze Medal Final, the Men's Sprint Gold Medal Final, the Women's Madison Final and the Women's Sprint 1/16 Finals and Repechages which took place at the Saint-Quentin-En-Yvelines Velodrome on 09/08/24.
The Women's Madison was won by Consonni/Guazinni (ITA) with Gold, Barker/Evans (GBR) with Silver and van Belle/van der Duin (NED) with Bronze.
The Men's Sprint was won by Harrie Lavreysen (NED) with Gold, Matthew Richardson (AUS) with Silver and Jack Carlin (GBR) with Bronze.

programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Yuan Cao (CHN) won Gold, Rikuto Tamai (JPN) won Silver and Noah Williams (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's Individual QFs/SFs/Finals | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals and Finals for Women's Individual Archery took place on 03/08/2024 at Invalides, Paris. Sihyeon Lim (KOR) won Gold, Suhyeon NAM (KOR) won Silver, Lisa Barbelin (FRA) took Bronze.

programme.title: Archery’s “Fan of the Year” Finds His Path Through Autism with the Sport
programme.desc: Andrew Hornsby is the sport’s biggest fan and is surprised with a trip across the globe to attend the Indoor World Finals

programme.title: An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's Singles Gold Medal match between An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 05/08/24. An Se Young (KOR) won the match with a final score of 2:0.
The medal ceremony saw An Se Young (KOR) take Gold, He Bing Jiao (CHN) take Silver and Gregoria Tunjung (INA) take the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Jia Min Yeo (SGP) v Dorsa Yavarivafa (EOR) - Women's Singles Group Play | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Singles Group Play match between Jia Min Yeo (SGP) v Dorsa Yavarivafa (EOR) took place on 27/07/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. Jia Min Yeo (SGP) won the match with a score of 2:0.

programme.title: The enduring family legacy of Olympic canoe legend Matija Ljubek
programme.desc: The sprint canoeist Matija Ljubek won four medals at four Olympic Games for Yugoslavia and became a national hero in the process. He passed on his love for the sport to his son Nikica, who became an Olympian himself.

programme.title: London legacy lives on with the help of Jessica Ennis-Hill and Etienne Stott
programme.desc: Four years on, we conquer canoe's Legacy Loop and meet a teenager emulating Jessica Ennis-Hill and an Olympic baby named after her.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 12 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 12 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. It included Women's Pole Vault Final, Men's Discus Throw Final, Men's 400m Final, and the Semi-Finals for 110m Hurdles, 400m Hurdles, 200m, 400m.

programme.title: Heroes of the Future - Giorgia Villa & Demis Angagregn
programme.desc: Giorgia Villa, a 12 year old Italian Artistic Gymnast, and Demis Angagregn, a 16 year old Runner from Ethiopia, compete for their future.

programme.title: Global Games (Part I)
programme.desc: Four Olympians and four social media stars from around the world go head to head in mash-up competitions with an Olympic twist.

programme.title: Heats, Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals & Finals | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Canoe Single 200m Heats, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Men's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Canoe Single 200m Quarter-Finals, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals and the Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 08/08/24.
The Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals were won by Liu Hao/Ji Bowen (CHN) with Gold, Gabriele Casadei/Carlo Tacchini (ITA) with Silver and Joan Antoni Moreno/Diego Dominguez (ESP) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by New Zealand who won Gold, Germany won Silver and Hungary won Bronze.
The Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by Germany who won Gold, Australia won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: Helen Glover eyes Paris 2024 for her fourth Olympics | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: After winning back-to-back gold in London 2012 and Rio 2016, Helen Glover made a remarkable come-back in Tokyo 2020, being the first mother to row for Britain. She and partner Polly Swann finished fourth. Helen now has her sights on Paris 2024 where she should be competing in the Women's four event, focusing on adding another Olympic medal to her impressive career for Team GB.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Epee Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Epee Team Finals took place on 30/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. Italy won the Gold medal over France, who took Silver. Poland won the Bronze over China.

programme.title: Global Games II (Part I)
programme.desc: Four Olympians and four social media stars from around the world go head to head in mash-up competitions with an Olympic twist.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Gauthier Grumier cooks with Maison Rostang´s Chef
programme.desc: Maison Rostang’s chef teaches this Olympic gold medalist fencer how to re-discover the gnocchis.

programme.title: In war-torn Iraq, this wheelchair fencer brings a message of hope
programme.desc: In Iraq, a roadside bomb left Ammar Ali in a wheelchair. The Paralympian is now determined to lead Iraq's wheelchair fencing team to gold.

programme.title: ARG-BEL Women's Bronze Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match with Argentina and Belgium took place on the 09/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 1. Final Score ARG 2(3):2(1) BEL.

programme.title: NED - CHN - Women's Gold Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Yves-du-Manoir Stadium, Paris, on 09/08/2024. Netherlands won Gold with a final score NED 1(3):(1)1 CHN.

programme.title: Lubjana Piovesana (AUT) v Clarisse Agbegnenou (FRA) - Women's -63kg Bronze Medal Contest | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Bronze Medal match took place at Champs-de-Mars Arena, Mat 1, on 30/07/24. Final score Clarisse Agbegnenou (FRA) 10:0 Lubjana Piovesana (AUT).
